SEARCH
Package fr.cs.group12.myFoodora.user

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
fr.cs.group12.myFoodora.user.User
fr.cs.group12.myFoodora.user.Manager
public class Manager extends User
The Manager class represents a user with managerial privileges in the MyFoodora system. It extends the User class and includes additional attributes such as surname and a reference to the MyFoodora system. It provides methods to manage users, set system parameters, compute statistics, and access system data.
